content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Juan. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm open to discussing the rental price of the apartment. Please, make me an offer, and we can negotiate from there.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I've been looking at similar apartments in the area, and I think a fair price would be around 700 Euros per month, including all utilities. What do you think?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Juan, your offer of 700 Euros per month, including all utilities, is an interesting starting point. However, considering the size of the apartment and its location, I believe we can discuss a higher price. What would you say to 850 Euros per month, including all utilities?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, your counteroffer of 850 Euros per month, including all utilities, is quite a significant increase from my initial offer. name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Juan, your proposed price of 750 Euros per month, including all utilities, is more in line with what you've seen in the area.
